page.title: 09The Quantock Wardens Office
page.content: The {Warden}travels by land rover down to his office in{Kilve Court}for 8.30 am .This happens each week day morning. At least the first hour is spent on office work, answering {phone {qeries}and dealing with the{mail.}This could lead onto further activities during the day. For example, today a query by letter concerning a {public {footpath}resulted in a phone call to the{person making a protest}over a path beingblocked by a locked gate. This was followed up by the {warden {walking the path}to discover a broken gate tied up. This necessitated a further phone{call pointing out the {trouble to the owner of the}gate. Similarly information of the {marines}on{night exercises}results in much communication by phone and letter to Parish Councils,and other interested parties.
